TABLE.NAME: syllabusviewer
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the syllabusviewer activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The categoryid to process. 0 is the default, meaning the entire site.

FIELD.NAME: categoryname
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the category, used if frozen.

TABLE.NAME: syllabusviewer_entries
TABLE.COMMENT: Each record in this table references a single file uploaded to the syllabus activity.

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course_module id of the syllabus viewer

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course where this file is found.

FIELD.NAME: syllabusid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the related syllabus activity.

FIELD.NAME: pathnamehash
FIELD.COMMENT: The file pathname hash from the files table.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The epoch time of the last update of this file.

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: The shortname of the course, used if frozen.

FIELD.NAME: teachers
FIELD.COMMENT: The teachers of this course, used if frozen.
